entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d8 + 7}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 3d6 + 7}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Glide
entries: For every 5 feet it falls downward, the giant beetle can expend 5 feet of movement to fly 10 feet forward. While it can move, the giant beetle is immune to damage from falling.

action.name: Bite

trait.name: Charge

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: If the boar takes 10 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Hold Breath
entries: The crocolisk can hold its breath for 30 minutes.

action.name: Multiattack

action.name: Tail
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target not {@condition grappled} by the crocolisk. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Web Sense
entries: While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.

trait.name: Web Walker
entries: The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

action.name: Infected Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage.

action.name: Burning Acid (Recharge after a Short or Long rest)
entries: The spider spews forth a burning hot acid. Each creature in a 10-foot cone must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much on a success.

entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one creature. {@h}The target is then {@condition restrained} by webbing and takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) acid damage at the beginning of the targets turn until it is freed. As an action, the {@condition restrained} target can make a {@dc 12} Strength check, bursting the webbing on a success. The webbing can also be attacked and destroyed (AC 10; hp 5; vulnerability to fire damage; immunity to bludgeoning, poison, and psychic damage).

trait.name: Keen Sight

entries: Hogger targets one ally he can see within 30 feet of him. If the target can see and hear him, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction.

reaction.name: Headbutt
entries: Hogger headbutts a creature within 5 feet that missed him with an attack. The creature must succeed on a {@dc 13} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until the end of Hogger's next turn. To do so, Hogger must see the attacker.

legendary.name: Attack
entries: Hogger makes one melee weapon attack.

legendary.name: Move
entries: Hogger move up to half his speed.

legendary.name: Kill Command (Costs 2 Actions)

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

headerEntries: The necrolyte's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save {@dc 16}), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necrolyte is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 16}, {@hit 8} to hit with spell attacks). The necrolyte regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest, and knows the following priest and warlock spells:
footerEntries: creatures under the necrolyte's command don't have to be willing.

trait.name: Corpse Shield
entries: As long as there is a undead creature under the command of the necrolyte within 60 feet of it that it can see, it can split up to half of the damage it takes among its undead minions.

trait.name: Focused Mind
entries: The necrolyte advantage on Constitution saving throws that it make to maintain its {@status concentration} on a spell.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:*, 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The abomination is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Stench
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 10 feet of the abomination must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of all abominations for 1 minute.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The abomination makes two attacks: one with its cleaver and one with its horrific hook.

action.name: Cannibalize
entries: The abomination cannibalize the corpse of creature that has been dead for less than 24 hours, regaining 30 hit points. Each creature of the abomination's choice that is within 120 feet and can see it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the abomination's Cannibalize for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Cleaver
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) slashing damage plus 5 ({@damage 1d10}) poison damage, and the target must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. It can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on a success.

action.name: Engorge
entries: The abomination makes one cleaver attack and places a {@condition grappled} target in its ribcage. The target becomes {@condition restrained}, and can use its action to break free by succeeding on a {@dc 17} Strength ({@skill Athletics}) or Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics}) check. While {@condition restrained} in this way, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage at the start of each of the abominations turns. An abomination can have only one creature {@condition restrained} within its ribcage.

action.name: Horrific Hook
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and if the target is a creature it must succeed on a {@dc 16} Strength saving throw or be {@condition grappled} and pulled to an empty space next to the abomination.

entries: When the helboar damages a creature with its spiked skin, it can use its reaction to deal an additional 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage.

Despite their name, {@b helboars} are not demons or part of the Burning Legion. As beasts who have been exposed to the energies of the Twisting Nether for long periods of time, simple boars have mutated into this spiked variety, capable of superheating their own skin as a defense mechanism.

If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}21 ({@damage 3d10 + 5}) slashing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the silithid can send a telepathic command whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 60 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can receive the command. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the silithid is {@condition incapacitated}.

action.name: Swallow
entries: The silithid makes one bite attack against a Medium or smaller creature it is grappling. If the attack hits, that creature takes the bite's damage and is swallowed, and the grapple ends. While swallowed, the creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the silithid, and it takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the silithid's turns.

If the silithid takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the silithid must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the silithid. If the silithid dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The hyena has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the hyena's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

{@b Hyenas} are a regular menace in the barren areas of Kalimdor. Centaurs are known to keep them as pets, vulpera and pygmies use them as mounts, and they are seen skulking around the desolate locations of the world, searching for rotting corpses to scavenge.

trait.name: Leadership

Cantrips (at will): chill touch, diabolism, fel flame, mage hand, shadow bolt*
1st-5th level (three 5th level slots): bane, cause fear, drain life, hex, ray of sickness, hold person, bestow curse, hunger of hadar, blight, compulsion, dominate person*

trait.name: The Inquistion Sees All
entries: An inquisitor often employs the uses of several {@creature Eye of Kilrogg|WC5E MoM|eyes of Kilrogg} to compensate for its lack of sight. The inquisitor in in telepathic communication with its eyes, and at any point, an inquisitor can be connected to up to 10 eyes at once.

As an action, the inquisitor can choose an eye it is bonded with. It can see everything that the eye sees, and can cast spells as if it is in the eye's space. In addition, if the inquisitor cast a spell that requires {@status concentration}, the eye be the one to maintain the {@status concentration} for that spell. This sight remains until either the eye is destroyed, or the inquisitor ends the connection (no action required).

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the kobold can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 ft. of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the kobold. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the kobold is {@condition incapacitated}.

variant.name: Candles in the Dark
entries: Kobold legends speak of a devouring presence, hiding in the darkness, giving to them their overwhelming fear of the dark.

A kobold without a lit candle, who is standing in dim light or darkness, must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The kobold can repeat the saving throw at the end of each its turns, also ending the effect if it manages to light a candle again.
On a successful save, if another creature was responsible for the loss of candlelight, the kobold deals an extra 4 ({@damage 1d6}) damage when it hits that creature with a melee attack.

trait.name: Beast of Burden
entries: The kodo is considered to be a Huge animal for the purpose of determining its carrying capacity.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the kodo moves at least 20 feet straight towards a Large or smaller creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the kodo can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
entries: Melee Attack Weapon: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}14 ({@damage 2d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Stomp
entries: Melee Attack Weapon: {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} target. {@h}16 ({@damage 2d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the lasher remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary plant.

action.name: Thorny Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the lasher remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary plant.

action.name: Thorn Slash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Acid Spit
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) acid damage. At the end of each of its turns, the creature must make a {@dc 10} Constitution saving throw, taking 2 ({@damage 1d4}) acid damage on a failure or ending the recurring acid damage on a success.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The spider can burrow through nonmagical unworked earth and stone. While doing so, it doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The spider sheds bright light in a 10-foot radius and dim light for an additional 10 feet.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The spider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The spider makes one bite attack and uses its Spit Fire.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage, plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) fire damage.

action.name: Spit Fire
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) fire damage.

trait.name: Escape Artist
entries: The gnome can move through the space of any Medium or larger creature.

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

trait.name: Miasma
entries: When the gnome dies, toxic fumes spread in a 10-foot radius out from it. The fumes spread around corners and its area is lightly obscured. It lasts for 1 minute or until a strong wind disperses it. Creatures that start their turn in that area must succeed on a {@dc 11} Constitution saving throw or gain the {@disease radiation sickness|WC5E MoM}.

action.name: Shortsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Pistol {@recharge 5}
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 3} to hit, range 60/240 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10 + 1}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Air Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whirlwind {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 10} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) bludgeoning damage and is flung up to 10 feet away from the elemental in a random direction and knocked {@condition prone}. If a thrown target strikes an object, such as a wall or floor, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) bludgeoning damage for every 10 feet it was thrown. If the target is thrown at another creature, that creature must succeed on a {@dc 10} Dexterity saving throw or take the same damage and be knocked {@condition prone}.
If the save is successful, the target takes half the damage and isn't flung away or knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Arcane Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. When the elemental enters the area of an {@spell antimagic field} spell for the first time on a turn or starts its turn there, it must succeed on a Constitution saving throw against the spell save DC of its spellcaster, or be {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 5-foot radius and dim light in an additional 5 feet.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The elemental has advantage on saving throws versus spells and other magical effects.

action.name: Touch
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) force damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Arcane Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The elemental erupts arcane energy at a point it can see within 60 feet of it. Each creature within 5 feet of that point must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 12 ({@damage 5d4}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Earth Glide
entries: The elemental can burrow through non-magical unworked earth and stone. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through.

trait.name: Siege Monster
entries: The elemental deals double damage to objects and structures.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the elemental can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

trait.name: Fel Flames
entries: Fire damage that the elemental deals ignores other creatures' fire resistance and treats fire immunity as resistance instead.

trait.name: Heat Aura
entries: A creature that hits the elemental with a melee attack while within 5 feet of the elemental or ends their turn there takes 2 ({@damage 1d4}) fire damage.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in an additional 20 feet.

action.name: Claw
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) fire damage.

trait.name: Fire Form
entries: The elemental can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage. In addition, the elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. The first time it enters a creature's space on a turn, that creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage and catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

trait.name: Illumination
entries: The elemental sheds bright light in a 20-foot radius and dim light in an additional 20 feet.

trait.name: Water Susceptibility
entries: For every 5 feet the elemental moves in water, or for every gallon of water splashed on it, it takes 1 cold damage.

action.name: Touch
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) fire damage. If the target is a creature or a flammable object, it ignites. Until a creature takes an action to douse the fire, the target takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) fire damage at the start of its turn.

trait.name: Frost Form
entries: The elemental can burrow through nonmagical unworked ice and snow. While doing so, the elemental doesn't disturb the material it moves through. A creature that touches the elemental or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 3 ({@damage 1d6}) cold damage. Additionally, the elemental freezes non-creature liquids within a 10-foot radius of it. A creature caught in the liquid when the elemental freezes it is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}).

trait.name: Ice Walk
entries: The elemental can move across and climb icy surfaces without needing to make an ability check. Additionally, difficult terrain composed of ice or snow doesn't cost extra movement.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Icicle
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. {@hit 4} to hit, range 30/60 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d12}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Water Form
entries: The elemental can enter a hostile creature's space and stop there. It can move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Freeze
entries: If the elemental takes cold damage, it partially freezes; its speed is reduced by 20 feet until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Slam
entries: Melee Weapon Attack. {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Whelm {@recharge 4}
entries: Each creature in the elemental's space must make a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw. On a failure, a target takes 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. If it is Medium or smaller, it is also {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. If the saving throw is successful, the target is pushed out of the elemental's space.

The elemental can grapple one Medium or smaller creature at a time. At the start of each of the elemental's turns, each target {@condition grappled} by it takes 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage. A creature within 5 feet of the elemental can pull a creature or object out of it by taking an action to make a {@dc 12} Strength and succeeding.

monster.name: Lich
languages: the languages it knew in life.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The lich is a 14th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 18}, {@hit 10} to hit with spell attacks). The lich has the following death knight and mage spells prepared:

trait.name: Innate Levitation
entries: The lich hovers above any surface but doesn't fly. It isn't affected by difficult terrain and can move over liquids turning them solid along its path.

trait.name: Ice Shield
entries: The lich has a magical ward that has 48 (half its hp) hit points. Whenever the lich takes damage, the ward takes the damage instead. If the ward is reduced to 0 hit points, the lich takes any remaining damage. When the lich casts spell that deals cold damage of 1st level or higher, the ward regains a number of hit points equal to twice the level of the spell. Additionally a creature that touches the ice shield takes 11 ({@damage 2d10}) cold damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The lich is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the lich fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Master of Undeath
entries: The lich has control over any undead created by the scourge within 500 feet that aren't under the command of someone else.

trait.name: Rejuvenation
entries: If it has a phylactery, a destroyed lich gains a new body in {@dice 1d10} days, regaining all its hit points and becoming active again. The new body appears within 5 feet of the phylactery.

trait.name: Turn Resistance
entries: The lich has advantage on saving throws against any effect that turns undead.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lich makes one attack with its claws and one with its chains.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@dice 2d8 + 3}) piercing and {@dice 2d8} (9) cold damage.

action.name: Undying Chains
entries: Melee Spell Attack. {@hit 10} to hit, reach 15 ft., one creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 3d8}) cold damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 18}). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and has disadvantage on all saving throws, and the lich can't chain another target.

legendary.name: Cantrip
entries: The lich casts one of its cantrips.

legendary.name: Claw (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The lich makes a Claw attack.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
entries: Each creature within 30 feet of the lich must make a {@dc 18} Constitution saving throw, taking 21 ({@damage 6d6}) necrotic damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The lion has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The lion has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the lion's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the lion moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

trait.name: Running Leap
entries: With a 10-foot running start, the lion can jump up to 25 feet.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The lion makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Terrifying Roar
entries: Each creature within 30 ft. of the lion that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 12} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the lion's Terrifying Roar for the next 24 hours.
A {@b lion} is a common sight across central Kalimdor. These fierce predators stalk the tall grass in small packs -- their prides -- and have been known to even hunt travellers.
More commonplace across Azeroth is the {@b mountain lion}, found both along the lush plains of Mulgore and up the grassy foothills of Hillsbrad.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The makrura can breathe air and water.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The makrura attacks twice with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d8 + 1}) bludgeoning damage. The target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 11}) The makrura has two claws, each of which can grapple only one target.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The makrura's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The makrura can breathe air and water.

entries: The makrura attacks twice with its claws.

trait.name: Trampling Charge
entries: If the mammoth moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a gore attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the mammoth can make one stomp attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Gore
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) piercing damage and the target must succeed a {@dc 14} Dexerity saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Stomp
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one {@condition prone} creature. {@h}29 ({@damage 4d10 + 7}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Swing. {@recharge}
entries: The mammoth swing its gore hitting all the creatures in front of it. All the creatures in a 10 ft. cone from the mammoth must make a {@dc 16} Dexerity, being knocked {@condition prone} and taking 25 ({@damage 4d8 + 7}) slashing damage and or half as much on a successful one.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: When the wyrm dies, it explodes in a burst of arcane. Each creature within 10 feet of it must make a {@dc 11} Dexterity saving throw, taking 5 ({@damage 2d4}) force damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

trait.name: Magic Sense
entries: The wyrm can sense magic users within 30 feet of it, and focus its attacks on those creatures.

trait.name: Mana Burn
entries: Whenever the wyrm hits a target with its bite, the target must succeed on a {@dc 11} Intelligence saving throw or have their lowest available spell slot expended. The target regains any spell slots lost in this way when they finish a short rest.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) force damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The sabercat has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The manasaber has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects

trait.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The manasaber's weapon attacks are considered magical.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the sabercat moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the sabercat can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The manasaber makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) piercing damage.

entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Dream Lash
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 3} to hit, range 15/30 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d10}) radiant damage.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The tank is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The tank has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Mechano Resistance
entries: The tank is resistance to the damage type of its thrower weapon, as described in the Mechano-tank Type table below.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The tank can use its Charged Leap. It then makes two machine gun attacks.

action.name: Machine Gun
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 5} to hit, range 120/380 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Thrower Weapon {@recharge 5}
entries: The tank uses its thrower to spew out a blast of destructive energy. The mechano-tank type determines the size, shape, and damage type of the thrower's attack. Each creature in the area of the thrower must make a {@dc 14} saving throw, the type of which is determined by the tank's thrower type. A creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a success.

action.name: Charged Leap {@recharge}
entries: The tank leaps high into the air, landing in a space no more than 60 feet from where it started. Each creature in the tank's space when it lands must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) damage of the tank's thrower type on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. On a failed saving throw, a target is knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The mechanostrider is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the mo'arg brute hits with it.

trait.name: Reckless
entries: At the start of its turn, the mo'arg brute can gain advantage on all melee weapon attack rolls it makes during that turn, but attack rolls against it have advantage until the start of its next turn.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The Mo'arg brute makes two greatsword attacks

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}23 ({@damage 5d6 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Hateful Stomp
entries: The mo'arg brute stomps its foot strongly upon the ground, causing all creatures within 10 feet to make a {@dc 18} Strength saving throw,  taking 11 ({@damage 2d10}) thunder damage and falling {@condition prone} on a failed save. On a success, a creature only takes half damage to no other ill effect.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The moonkin is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spell casting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The moonkin has the following druid spells prepared:

entries: The moonkin has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks it makes that rely on sight or smell.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)

action.name: Hooves

If the target is {@condition prone}, the lion can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Net
entries: Ranged Weapon Attack. {@hit 3} to hit, range 5/15 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}The target is {@condition restrained}. A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 10} Strength check to free itself or another creature in a net, ending the effect on a success. Dealing 5 slashing damage to the net (AC 10) frees the target without harming it and destroys the net.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The naga can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The naga has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

action.name: Scimitar
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5ft, one creature. {@h}5 ({@dice 1d6 + 2})

action.name: Trident
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 10 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the naga cannot constrict another target.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The naga can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: if the naga takes 20 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The naga has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes one bite attack and one slam attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) piercing damage.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 9} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Massive Crash (Recharges 4-6)
entries: The naga slams the ground creating an earth tremor around it. Each creature other than the naga in a 10-foot radius centered on the naga must make a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 31 ({@damage 7d8}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the naga can move up to its speed toward an enemy of its choice that it can see or hear. It must end this move closer to the enemy than it started.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The naga can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The naga has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes two halberd attacks, one of which can be replaced with its constrict attack.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage, and target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 13}). Until the grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the naga cannot constrict another target.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The naga is an 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The naga has the following mage and shaman spells prepared:

entries: The naga can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery

headerEntries: The naga's innate spellcasting ability
is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Medium or smaller creature. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) bludgeoning damage, and target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 12}). Until the grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the naga cannot constrict another target.

trait.name: Amphibious
entries: The naga can breathe air and water.

trait.name: Slippery
entries: The naga has advantage on ability checks and saving throws made to escape a grapple.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The naga makes two halberd attacks, one of which can be replaced with its constrict attack.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one creature. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d10 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Constrict
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one Large or smaller creature. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage, and target is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}). Until the grapple ends, the creature is {@condition restrained}, and the naga cannot constrict another target.

action.name: Crashing Wave (Recharges 5-6)
entries: The naga charges forward creating a wave of water that crashes anyone on its path. The naga moves 20 feet forward in a straight line producing a wave 20 feet long, 10 feet tall and 10 feet wide . Each creature in that area must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 22 ({@damage 5d8}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a successful save, a creature takes half as much damage and isn't knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the naga can utter a special command or warning whenever a non-hostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its roll provided it can hear and understand the naga. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the naga is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Parry
entries: The naga adds 3 to its AC against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the naga must see the attacker and be wielding a melee weapon.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necrolyte's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It can innately cast the following spells (spell save {@dc 13}), requiring no material components:

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The necrolyte is a 5th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 13}, {@hit 5} to hit with spell attacks). The necrolyte regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest, and knows the following priest and warlock spells:

trait.name: Focused Mind
entries: The necrolyte advantage on Constitution saving throws that it make to maintain its {@status concentration} on a spell.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. *Hit:*, 4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Clone Magic
entries: The observer can cast {@spell spellsteal|WC5E Spells} at will as a bonus action, using Intelligence as its spellcasting ability. When it successfully steals a spell, it also regains a number of hit points equal to five times the spell level.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 3d6}) piercing damage and 4 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage, and the creature is {@condition grappled} (escape {@dc 15}).

action.name: Tongue Lash
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d10}) bludgeoning damage and 7 ({@damage 2d6}) acid damage

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: The observer shoots three of the predetermined magical eye rays at random, choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it.

items.name: 1. Arcane Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 23 ({@damage 5d8}) force damage and is pushed 10 feet directly away from the observer.

items.name: 2. Disintegration Ray
items.entry: If the target is a creature, it must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) force damage. If this damage reduces the creature to 0 hit points, its body becomes a pile of fine gray dust. If the target is a Large or smaller nonmagical object or creation of magical force, it is disintegrated without saving throw. If the target is a Hude or larger object or creation of magical force, this ray disintegrates a 10-foot cube of it.

items.name: 3. Draining Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage. The observer regains hit points equal to half the amount of necrotic damage the target takes.

items.name: 4. Fel Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage. This ray ignores fire resistance, and creatures immune to fire damage are considered to be resistant.

items.name: 5. Fire Ray
items.entry: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw, taking 17 ({@damage 3d10}) fire damage and the creature catches fire; until someone takes an action to douse the fire, the creature takes 5 ({@damage 1d10}) fire damage at the start of each of its turns.

items.name: 6. Frost Ray
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) cold damage and have their movement speed reduced to half for 1 minute.

items.name: 7. Mind Ray
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) psychic damage and and have disadvantage on all attack rolls and ability checks for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 8. Optic Link
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) necrotic damage, and the observer keeps the ray linked to the creature for 1 minute. The target must repeat the saving throw at the end of its turns. On a success, the effect ends. On failure, the target takes 5 ({@damage 1d8}) necrotic damage. The number of damage dice of this effect increases by 1 for each round this link has been active.

items.name: 9. Poison Ray
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or take 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 10. Paralyzing Ray
entries: The targeted creature must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: 11. Petrification Ray
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the creature begins to turn to stone and is {@condition restrained}. It must repeat the saving throw at the end of its next turn. On a success, the effect ends. On a failure, the creature is {@condition petrified} until freed by the {@spell greater restoration} spell or other.

items.name: 12. Shadow Ray
entries: The targeted creature must make a {@dc 14} Wisdom saving throw or take 14 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage and be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the ogre can move up to its speed toward an enemy of its choice that it can see or hear. It must end this move closer to the enemy than it started.

trait.name: Mighty Presence
entries: While it is conscious, the ogre and any friendly creature within 10 feet of it has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The ogre makes two greatclub attacks, one of which can be replaced with its shockwave.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 8} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Shockwave {@recharge 5}
entries: The ogre hits the ground with its greatclub causing a burst of concussive force. Each creature in a 15-foot cone  originating from the ogre must make a Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 14 ({@damage 4d6}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. If the ground in that area is loose earth or stone, it becomes difficult terrain.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ogre is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The ogre has the following mage spells prepared:
footerEntries: The ogre casts mage armor on itself before combat.

trait.name: Two Heads
entries: The ogre has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks and on saving throws against being {@condition blinded}, {@condition charmed}, {@condition deafened}, {@condition frightened}, {@condition stunned}, and knocked {@condition unconscious}.

action.name: Maul:
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ogre is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 14}, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The ogre has the following priest spells prepared:
footerEntries: The ogre casts shield of faith on itself before combat

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 6} to hit, range 60/180 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) bludgeoning damage.

trait.name: Keen Sight and Smell
entries: The owlbeast has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks it makes that rely on sight or smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The owlbeast makes two attacks: one with its beak and one with its claws.

action.name: Beak
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) piercing damage, or 10 ({@damage 1d8 + 6}) piercing damage while enraged.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) slashing damage, or 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage while enraged.

action.name: Wild Rage (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute the owlbeast enters a rage. While enraged, the owlbeast's attacks deal an additional 3 damage (included in the attacks), and makes Strength checks and Strength saving throws with advantage.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The panther has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the panther moves at least 20 feet straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 12} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}. If the target is {@condition prone}, the panther can make one bite attack against it as a bonus action.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) slashing damage.

resist.note: damage from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

trait.name: Commanding Presence
entries: Demon's within 30 feet of the pit lord gain a bonus to their initiative equal to its Charisma modifier, and a demon who drops to 0 hit points while within 30 feet of the pit lord can make one melee attack before falling {@condition unconscious}.

trait.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pit lord has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

trait.name: Fel Weapons
entries: the pit lord's weapon attacks are magical.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the pit lord fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Death Throes
entries: When the pit lord dies, it explodes, and each creature within 30 feet of it must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) fire damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. The explosion ignites flammable objects in that area that aren't being worn or carried, and it destroys the pit lord's weapons.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pit lord makes two melee weapon attacks, then can uses its Bellowing Howl action.

action.name: Halberd
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 15 ft., one target. {@h}25 ({@damage 3d10 + 9}) slashing damage + 7 ({@damage 2d6}) fire damage

action.name: Cleave
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 15} to hit, reach 10ft., up to three targets. {@h}15 ({@damage 1d12 + 9}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bellowing Howl
entries: Each creature of the pit lord's choice that can hear it within 120 feet of the pit lord and is aware of it must succeed on a {@dc 20} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to the pit lord's Bellowing Howl for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Demonic Command
entries: Each ally of the pit lord's within 60 feet of it can't be {@condition charmed} or {@condition frightened} until the end of its next turn.

action.name: Summon Demons (1/Day)
entries: The pit lord calls into the depths of the Twisted Nether, summon either one infernal or {@dice 2d4} felhunters. They roll and act on their own initiatives.

legendary.name: Demonic Command
entries: The pit lord uses its Demonic Command action
br> **Halberd (Cost 2 Actions).** The pit lord makes a halberd attack

br> **Tail Sweep (Cost 3 Actions).** The pit lord sweeps its tail out. Each creature within 10 feet of the pit lord must succeed on a {@dc 25} Strength saving throw. On a fail, a creature takes 13 ({@damage 1d8 + 9}) bludgeoning damage and is knocked {@condition prone}. On a success, a creature only takes half damage and does not fall {@condition prone}.
br> **Cleave (Cost 3 Actions).** The pit lord uses its Cleave action

monster.name: Plague Eruptor
languages: the languages it knew in life but can't speak.

trait.name: Leaking Pustules
entries: A creature that touches the plague eruptor or hits it with a melee attack while within 5 feet of it takes 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Deadly Plague
entries: Poison damage that the plague eruptor deals ignores resistance and immunity to poison damage. It can inflict the {@condition poisoned} condition even on creatures normally immune to it. When it deals a critical hit, the target is infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}.

trait.name: Plague Eruption
entries: When the plague eruptor dies, it explodes, and each creature within 15 feet of it must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) poison damage and become infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM} on a failed save. A successful save results in half damage and no other effect. A humanoid creature killed by this damage rises as a zombie after 1 minute.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The plague eruptor makes two slam attacks and uses its vile gas ability.

action.name: Slam
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Vile Gas
entries: The plague eruptor expels a poisonous cloud in 10-feet radius around it. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) poison damage. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage.

action.name: Vile Gas Eruption {@recharge}
entries: One of the plague eruptors pustules explodes into a cloud of poison that covers a 15-foot cube. Each creature in the area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 ({@damage 4d8}) poison damage and is {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't {@condition poisoned}. A {@condition poisoned} creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Plague-dog
languages: understands the languages of its creator but can't speak

trait.name: Deadly Plague
entries: Poison damage that the plague-dog deals ignores resistance and immunity to poison damage. It can inflict the {@condition poisoned} condition even on creatures normally immune to it. When it deals a critical hit, the target is infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}.

trait.name: Immutable Form
entries: The Plague-dog is immune to any spell or effect that would alter its form.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The plague-dog makes two attacks: one bite and one claw attack.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@dice 2d12 + 7}) piercing and 13 ({@damage 2d12}) poison damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 17} Dexterity saving throw or be swallowed by the plague-dog. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the worm, and takes 21 ({@damage 6d6}) poison damage at the start of each of the plague dog's turns. A plague dog can have only one creature swallowed at a time.

If the plague dog takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from the swallowed creature, the plague-dog must succeed on a {@dc 14} Constitution saving throw or the creature successfully cuts its way through the dog and falls {@condition prone} in a space within 5 feet of the plague-dog. If the plague-dog dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 15 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 10} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}20 ({@damage 3d8 + 7}) slashing damage.

trait.name: Deadly Plague
entries: Poison damage that the plaguebear deals ignores resistance and immunity to poison damage. It can inflict the {@condition poisoned} condition even on creatures normally immune to it.  When it deals a critical hit, the target is infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The plaguebear lets out a burst of toxic sludge when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage and become infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM} on a failed save. A successful save results in half damage and no other effect.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The plaguebear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The plaguebear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2}) slashing damage plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) poison damage.

trait.name: Deadly Plague
entries: Poison damage that the dragon deals ignores resistance and immunity to poison damage. It can inflict the {@condition poisoned} condition even on creatures normally immune to it. When it deals a critical hit, the target is infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}.

trait.name: Legendary Resistance (3/Day)
entries: If the dragon fails a saving throw, it can choose to succeed instead.

trait.name: Plague Cloud
entries: Any creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 20}
Constitution saving throw or take 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage and be {@condition poisoned} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Plagued Blood
entries: When the dragon takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 15 feet of the dragon takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon can use its Cannibalize. It then makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}17 ({@damage 2d10 + 6}) piercing damage plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) slashing damage.

action.name: Tail Sweep
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 12} to hit, reach 15 ft., all targets in reach. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d8 + 6}) bludgeoning damage.

action.name: Cannibalize
entries: The dragon cannibalizes the corpse of a dragon or humanoid within 10 feet that has been dead for less than a day, regaining 26 ({@dice 4d12}) hit points. Each creature of the dragon's choice that is within 60 feet of the dragon and can see it must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or become {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's save is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature is immune to any dragon's cannibalize for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The drake uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Dreadful Breath
entries: The drake exhales sludge in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw, taking 52 ({@damage 15d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails their saving throw by 5 or more must make a {@dc 15} Constitution save or contract the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}. In addition, any humanoid killed by the dreadful breath rises at the start of the dragon's turn as a zombie that is permanently under its command, following its verbal orders to the best of its ability.

action.name: Shadow Breath
entries: The drake exhales shadowy fire in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 20} Strength saving throw or take 17 ({@damage 5d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns and have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, checks, and saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragon can magically polymorph into a humanoid or back into its true form. Its humanoid form always appears to be sickly and half-rotted. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (its choice).
In a new form, the dragon retains its alignment, hit points, ability to speak, proficiencies, Legendary Resistance, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action.

legendary.name: Call Darkness
entries: In a 30-foot radius of the dragon, bright light becomes dim light and dim light becomes darkness. Any nonmagical light sources within the area have the light they produce suppressed. This effect lasts until the end of the dragon's next turn and moves with the dragon.

legendary.name: Wrack
entries: Target creature within 120 feet the dragon can see must succeed on a {@dc 18} Wisdom saving throw or have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, checks, and saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effects on itself on a success.

legendary.name: Death and Decay (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: Each non-undead creature within 30 feet must make a {@dc 18} Constituion saving throw, taking 13 ({@damage 3d8}) necrotic damage on a failed save. Until the end of its next turn, whenever the creature makes an attack roll or saving throw, it must roll a {@dice d4} and subtract the number rolled from the attack roll or saving throw. A successful save results in half damage and no other effects.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The dragon beats its wings. Each creature within 10 feet of the dragon must succeed on a {@dc 20} Dexterity saving throw or take 13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6}) bludgeoning damage and be knocked {@condition prone}. The dragon can then fly up to half its flying speed.

trait.name: Deadly Plague
entries: Poison damage that the dragonwhelp deals ignores resistance and immunity to poison damage. It can inflict the {@condition poisoned} condition even on creatures normally immune to it.  When it deals a critical hit, the target is infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}.

trait.name: Plagued Blood
entries: When the dragonwhelp takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 5 feet of the dragonwhelp takes 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) piercing damage plus 4 ({@damage 1d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Dreadful Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragonwhelp exhales sludge in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 12} Dexterity saving throw, taking 10 ({@damage 3d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one. A creature that fails their saving throw by 5 or more must make a {@dc 15} Constitution save or contract the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}.

action.name: Change Shape
entries: The dragonwhelp can magically polymorph into a humanoid or back into its true form. Its humanoid form always appears to be sickly and half-rotted. It reverts to its true form if it dies. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying is absorbed or borne by the new form (its choice).
In a new form, the dragonwhelp retains its alignment, hit points, ability to speak, proficiencies and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action.

trait.name: Deadly Plague

trait.name: Plagued Blood
entries: When the drake takes damage of any type but psychic, each creature within 10 feet of the drake takes 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The drake makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. {@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) piercing damage plus 9 ({@damage 2d8}) poison damage.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Breath Weapons {@recharge 5}
entries: The drake uses one of the following breath weapons.

action.name: Dreadful Breath
entries: The drake exhales sludge in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 ({@damage 11d6}) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on  a successful one. A creature that fails their saving  throw by 5 or more must make a {@dc 15} Constitution save or contract the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM}.

action.name: Shadow Breath
entries: The drake exhales shadowy fire in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Strength saving throw or take 10 ({@damage 3d6}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns and have disadvantage on Strength-based attack rolls, checks, and saving throws for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a uccess.

In a new form, the drake retains its alignment, hit points, ability to speak, proficiencies, and Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores, as well as this action.

trait.name: Death Burst
entries: The proto-drake lets out a burst of toxic sludge when it drops to 0 hit points. Each creature within 5 feet of it must succeed on a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) poison damage and become infected with the {@disease plague of undeath|WC5E MoM} on a failed save. A successful save results in half damage and no other effect.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The proto-dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Bite

action.name: Claw

trait.name: Snow Camouflage
entries: The bear has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks made to hide in snowy terrain.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The bear has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The bear makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Claws

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The pterrordax doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pterrordax can use its Terrifying Screech. It then makes two claw attacks.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Terrifying Screech
entries: Each creature within 60 feet of the pterrordax that can hear it must succeed on a {@dc 11} Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the {@condition frightened} condition on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this pterrordax's Frightful Screech for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Flyby
entries: The pterrorwing doesn't provoke an opportunity attack when it flies out of an enemy's reach.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The pterrorwing can use its Terrifying Screech. It then makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

action.name: Claw
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 6} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Bite

If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to this pterrorwing's Frightful Screech for the next 24 hours.

action.name: Skycall {@recharge 5}
entries: The pterrorwing screams and a thunderous force sweeps out from it in a 15 foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a {@dc 15} Constitution saving throw, taking 33 ({@damage 6d10}) thunder damage on a failed save and is pushed 15 feet away from it. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage and isn't pushed.

trait.name: Keen Smell
entries: The quilboar has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Vengeance
entries: The quilboar can make an opportunity attack with disadvantage against a target within range when another quilboar that it can see or hear dies.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) slashing damage.

action.name: Mace
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 3} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d6 + 1}) bludgeoning damage.

entries: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the quilboar can spew quills back at the attacker. {@i Melee Weapon Attack:} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Smell

trait.name: Vengeance
entries: The quilboar can make an opportunity attack with disadvantage against a target within range when an ally that it can see or hear dies.

trait.name: Brute
entries: A melee weapon deals one extra die of its damage when the quilboar hits with it (included in the attack).

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quilboar makes two melee attacks: one with its tusk and one with its battleaxe.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}8 ({@damage 2d4 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Charge
entries: If the quilboar moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target and then hits it with a tusk attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 5 ({@damage 2d4}) slashing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Relentless (Recharges after a Short or Long rest)
entries: If the quilboar takes 12 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

reaction.name: Quills
entries: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the quilboar can spew quills back at the attacker. {@i Melee Weapon Attack:} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Vengeance

trait.name: Brute

action.name: Battleaxe
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage, or 14 ({@damage 2d10 + 3}) slashing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Leadership (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: For 1 minute, the quilboar can utter a special command or warning whenever a nonhostile creature that it can see within 30 feet of it makes an attack roll or a saving throw. The creature can add a {@dice d4} to its rolls provided it can hear and understand the quilboar. A creature can benefit from only one Leadership die at a time. This effect ends if the quilboar is {@condition incapacitated}.

reaction.name: Quills
entries: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the quilboar can spew quills back at the attacker. {@i Melee Weapon Attack:} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

entries: The quilboar has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on smell.

trait.name: Vengeance
entries: The quilboar can make an opportunity attack with disadvantage against a target within range when another quilboar that it can see or hear dies.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The quilboar uses its Master's Command. It then makes one attack with its tusks or javelin.

action.name: Tusk
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 2} to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) slashing damage.

action.name: Javelin
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 4} to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage.

action.name: Master's Command
entries: The quilboar commands a tamed beast within 30 feet of it to attack a target, giving the beast advantage on the next attack it makes against it.

reaction.name: Quills
entries: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the quilboar can spew quills back at the attacker. {@i Melee Weapon Attack:} {@hit 4} to hit, range 10 ft., one target. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2}) piercing damage.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The raptor has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the raptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the raptor moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw or bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

variant.name: Falcosaur
entries: Falcosaurs are an invasive and predatory dinosaur species that can be found on the coastlines of the Broken Isles. They look like feathered raptors with a huge beak and have a primal need to hunt that develops at a young age. While falcosaurs are predatory, they are actually omnivores and eat fruits as well as berries in large quantities.

items.name: Bloodgazer
entries: While the colors they sport make them look fierce and intimidating, the bloodgazer falcosaurs are predisposed to eating fruit and berries.

items.name: Direbeak
entries: Direbeak falcosaurs are the heartiest of the bunch. Their sense of smell however, is not as good as that of other falcosaur species, which had led them to prefer pungent meals and are often found feasting on carrion that has been in the sun for days. Their shimmering hides have adapted to confuse and disorient prey.
A falcosaur of the direbeak tribe has its {@b {@i Keen Hearing and Smell}} trait replaced by:

entries.name: Shimmering Hide
entries: When a creature attacks the falcosaur, it gets momentarilly disoriented. The attacker has disadvantage on the attack roll.

items.name: Sharptalon
entries: The viridian sharptalon falcosaurs have a diet which subsist mainly on small nuts and berries, their claws are used mostly for defense. Their viridian hide allow for them to blend into magical forests and non-magical forests alike.
A falcosaur of the sharptalon tribe has the additional trait:

entries.name: Veridian Hide
entries: The sharptalon falcosaur has advantage on hiding in forests and woodlands.

items.name: Snowfeather
entries: Snowfeather falcosaur are the most predatory of all known falcosaur species while being particularly fond of large prey. Their hide and fur allow them to hide in fog and fog banks.
A falcosaur of the snowfeather tribe has the additional trait:

entries.name: Snowfeather Hide
entries: The snowfeather falcosaur has advantage on hiding in fog or snow.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The raptor has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Pack Tactics
entries: The raptor has advantage on attack rolls against a creature if at least one of the raptor's allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Pounce
entries: If the raptor moves at least 20 ft. straight toward a creature and then hits it with a claw or bite attack on the same turn, that target must succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

action.name: Multiattack
entries: The raptor makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.

action.name: Bite
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage.

action.name: Claws
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d8 + 3}) slashing damage.

action.name: Matron's Call (1/Day)
entries: The raptor utters a series of guttural noises and cries. Other raptors within 30 ft. who hear the call, can use their reaction to make an opportunity attack against a creature within 5 ft. of them.
